prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特IO檢測CD3-FITC/CD16+CD56-PE單株抗體
ingredientsDesc:
Specifications
Specificity 	CD3	CD16	CD56
Clone	UCHT1	3G8	N901(NKH-1)
Hybridoma	NS1 x Balb/c	SP2/0 x Balb/c	NS1/1-Ag4 x Balb/c
Immunogen	Peripheral blood human lymphocytes	Human neutrophils	Human chronic myeloid leukaemia cells (CMML)
Immunoglobulin	IgG1	IgG1	IgG1
Species	Mouse	Mouse	Mouse
Source	Ascites	Ascite	Ascite
Purification	Protein A affinity chromatography	Protein A affinity chromatography
Fluorochrome	FITC	PE
λ excitation	488 nm	488 nm
Emission	525 nm	575 nm
Buffer	PBS pH 7.2 plus 2 mg / BSA and 0.1% NaN3
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: 這個螢光標定的抗體混合物適用於使用流式細胞儀進行多重參數分析。它允許偵測白血球細胞上的CD3、CD16和CD56抗原的表現

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.5220 自動區別細胞計數器

factoryDtoList.factoryName: IMMUNOTECH SAS, A BECKMAN COULTER COMPANY
factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 130.AVENUE DE LATTRE DE TASSIGNY-BP177-13276 MARSEILLE CEDEX 9-FRANCE
